definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be of use of service, benefit (Tel Am. sakânu, care for (c. prep. ana) Zim:ZA vi. 248 Wkl:TA Gloss.; Ph. [[סכן]] prefect Lzb:329; cf. perh. Tel Am. zukini as loan-word Wkl:l. c.);—
be of use or service, only pt. ´[[וּתְהִי לוֹ ס]] 1Ki 1:2 and let her become servitress to him, so v:1Ki 1:4 (+ [[וְתְּשָׁרֲתֵהוּ]]); [[סׂכֵן]] Is 22:15 = servitor, steward.
benefit, profit, abs. Job 15:3; c. [[לְ]] pers. Job 22:2, Job 35:3, [[עַל־]] pers. Job 22:2; c. acc. Job 34:9 (or abs. gain benefit, [[גבר]] subj.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[הִסְכַּ֫נְתִּי]] Nu 22:20; 2 ms. [[הִסְבַָּנְתָּה]] Ps 139:3; Imv. [[הַסְכֶּן־נׇא]] Job 22:21; Inf. abs. [[הַסְכֵּן]] Nu 22:30; —be used, wont, strictly exhibit use, or habit, [[הַהַסְכֵּן הִסְכַּנְתִּי לַעֲשׂוֹת]] [[לְ ְכּׂה]] Nu 22:30 (J) have I ever shewn the habit of doing thus to thee? hence shew harmony with ([[עִם]]) one Job 22:21, be familiar with, know intimately (subj. ´[[י]]) Ps 139:3 (c. acc. [[דְּרָכַי]]).
